EmailTemplate.name: LNS Stress Management and Revision Workshop - system error
EmailTemplate.subject: Stress and revision workshop application - system error!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Stress Management and Revision Workshop - system error!
Our last email linked to the wrong application form - if you filled it out then your attendance may not be logged!
If you would like to attend then please respond to this email with your name and school/college, or visit the correct application form here.
If you have any questions then please email tcs.westlondon@the-challenge.org.
